commands.name: clean-up
commands.title: Clean Up
commands.subtitle: Brew
commands.description: Clean files and packages from the cache that are older than 120 days

preferences.name: withoutThreshold
preferences.title: Clean Up
preferences.label: Include --prune=all when cleaning
preferences.description:
Include --prune=all when cleaning files & packages from cache.
This option bypasses the 120 days threshold.

preferences.name: customBrewPath
preferences.title: Custom Brew Executable Path
preferences.description: Set this if your brew executable is in a non-standard location

preferences.name: terminalApp
preferences.title: Terminal Application
preferences.description: The terminal application/emulator to use when using any Run in Terminal action.

preferences.name: greedyUpgrades
preferences.title: Upgrades
preferences.description: Include auto-updating casks when upgrading or checking for outdated items.
preferences.label: Include auto-updating casks when upgrading

preferences.name: zapCask
preferences.title: Uninstall
preferences.label: Remove all files associated with a cask.
preferences.description:
Run cask uninstall with the --zap option for a more complete uninstallation of files associated with cask.
WARNING: This may remove files shared with other applications.

preferences.name: quarantine
preferences.title: Quarantine
preferences.label: Enable quarantine of downloads
preferences.description: Enable or disable quarantine of files downloaded by brew

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
